item.title: COVID-19 MAP (PICTURE)
item.description: Figure 1: Rmd法 md法 nCov2019包绘制图片 Figure 2: 图 x <- get_nCov2019() d <- x['湖北',] dev.new() ggplot(d, aes(area = dead, fill = name, label = paste(name, dead, sep = "\n"))) + geom_treemap() + geom_treemap_text(fontface = "italic", colour = "white", place = "centre",grow = TRUE)
